abstract: Judith Newman reviews celebrity self-help books The Longevity Book by Cameron Diaz and Sandra Bark, Balancing in Heels: My Journey to Health, Happiness, and Making It All Work by Kristin Cavallari, Pretty Happy: Healthy Ways to Love Your Body by Kate Hudson and Billie Fitzpatrick, Fierce Optimism: Seven Secrets for Playing Nice and Winning Big by Leeza Gibbons and Winning Arguments: What Works and Doesn't Work in Politics, the Bedroom, the Courtroom, and the Classroom by Stanley Fish.
